alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:15PM CDT until August 07 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Walker County in central Alabama... Southeastern Winston County in northwestern Alabama... Northeastern Fayette County in west central Alabama... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 214 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kansas, or over Carbon Hill, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Carbon Hill, Sipsey, Kansas, Nauvoo, Eldridge, Curry, Camp McDowell, Smith Dam, Ashbank, Lynns Park, Smith Lake, Maple Branch, Empire, Little Dismal Creek, Coon Creek, Cedrum Area, Holly Grove, Powellville and Lupton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
